description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8 (2019) runs on Android 9.0 Pie, and sports an 8-inch IPS LCD 1200 x 1920 pixels Display with a 16:10 aspect ratio. The device is powered by an Exynos 7904 Octa 1.8 GHz 14 nm Octa-core processor, coupled with 3 GB of RAM and 32 GB of inbuilt storage which is expandable up to 512 GB via microSD card. Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2019) features a dual-camera setup at the rear, comprised of an 8-megapixel main sensor with an f/2.0 aperture, a 5-megapixel secondary sensor with an f/2.2 aperture, and also comes with the Live Focus feature. The amazing Tab A 8 (2019) is available in three different colors Black and Gray. This device is unstoppable with a 42,00 mAh battery under the hood and has an accelerometer and proximity sensor.
